Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Good morning, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Morning... Celica...', 3: '6'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Whoa! Those are quite the striking pair of panda eyes! Are you... alright?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I was making Zongs', 3: '8', 4: 'I got a little carried away cooking', 5: '8'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Zongs? Oh yes, Duanwu festival is coming up. Did you make these yourself, Commandant? They look pretty tasty.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Are those Zongs you have there? What an armful! Are those for the Constructs?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yes', 3: '11', 4: "It's Duanwu festival after all", 5: '11'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Ah... that's very thoughtful of you, Commandant, but be sure to ferret out the likes and dislikes of our Constructs, to avoid embarrassment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Wars have been started over less!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Celica leaves before you could muster a response.'}
{2: 'Wars...?', 3: '16', 4: 'What does she mean by that?', 5: '16'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: '(A delicate sheen of nervous energy does seem to be in the air today. All around Babylonia, people look at one another with wary and distrustful stares)'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'Good day. Could those be Zongs you have there? Mind if we open them up for inspection?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why is that?', 3: '24', 4: 'Of course not', 5: '24'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'Oh, no need to worry. We just wanted to make sure. Oh, and also ask you to vote for us.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Hey! Canvassing is prohibited!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: "You'll have to come with us!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "Uh-oh... it's the Zong Police! Scram!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Stop right there!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: "There's another! Arrest first, ask questions later!", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Commandant, over here!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Thank goodness, Commandant. You almost got caught up in that debacle...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia?', 3: '48', 4: "What's going on here?", 5: '48'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You didn't know? As thanks for our assistance in escorting the Forsaken shipment, the ACA sent Babylonia a batch of assorted Zongs.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Disagreements started to spread from the ideal flavor of Zongs, all the way into other food preferences and the definition of good taste...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'For what...', 3: '52', 4: 'Is this the "war" Celica spoke of?', 5: '52'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Now the two factions are hosting referendums in an attempt to install their flavor as the official Babylonian flavor.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What about this "Zong Police" business...', 3: '55'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The "Zong Police" is a temporary constabulary, hastily put together to head off impeding violence between the two factions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The streets are no longer safe if you're carrying Zongs, Commandant...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Say, those Zongs you have there, Commandant. Are they for us?', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Gift Sweet Zongs)', 3: '60', 4: '(Gift Savory Zongs)', 5: '60'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You made these, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is it to your liking?', 3: '63'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Well... I\'m not sure what my likings are, or rather, what "Lucia\'s" likings are.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But I'll like it, Commandant, as long as you're making it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Oh, there you are, Lucia. Good morning, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What a coincidence, Liv. The Commandant has a gift for us.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Really? Are those Zongs? I didn't know Commandant knew how to make them.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: '(Which Zong should I give Liv?)'}
{2: 'Honey and Bean Paste (Sweet Zong)', 3: '77', 4: 'Pork and Egg Yolk (Savory Zong)', 5: '91', 6: 'Ask Lucia for advice', 7: '106'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'No problem.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'So different from normal desserts... sweet, still fresh. Is this really made out of rice?', 4: '1'}
{2: "(Pick a grain of rice from the corner of Liv's mouth)", 3: '81'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Oh! This is... Thank you, Commandant... this is embarrassing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Time permitting, could Commandant give me some direction too?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Okay, then... it's a date!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'No problem.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Thank you... you really poured your heart into it, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Liv's smile always feels somewhat forced."}
{3: 'Suddenly, several Construct Soldiers rush over with whistles in their mouths.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Zong-related dispute detected!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: "Are you trying to start another war, feeding people Zongs you know they won't like?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Humanity shall remain forever divided by the unbridgeable Zong Schism. It is up to us, the Zong Police, to maintain the fragile peace on Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: 'Take them away. It is because of these people that war never changes.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wait!? What the', 3: '103'}
{2: 'Please give me a chance!', 3: '25853'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Alright then... but choose wisely this time.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I think Liv is attempting to make her own Zongs as well, but it doesn't seem to be going so well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lee and I have tasted quite a few desserts Liv has whipped up with scraps and leftovers. I thought they were good... but Liv always seemed unsatisfied.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Liv seems pretty happy just to receive Zongs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Now to give away the rest', 3: '113'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So this is the meaning of festivals, and gifts... So simple, and yet it brings such joy...', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's the thought that counts", 3: '115'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The thought that... counts...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Ah, Lee. It's good that you're here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Zongs? Even Commandant has joined the madding crowd...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No, these are handmade by Commandant, in the spirit of the festival.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I see. But I wish to get one thing straight: no matter who made these Zongs, my critique will be honest and uncompromising.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: '(Which Zong should I give Lee?)'}
{2: 'Mushroom and Pork (Savory Zong)', 3: '128', 4: 'Sticky Rice and Bean Paste (Sweet Zong)', 5: '135', 6: 'Ask Lucia for advice', 7: '139'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '(Quietly, Lee finishes the Zong and gives a curt nod)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "A decent attempt, I'd say...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Lee looks decently... satisfied? Let's call it that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Commandant, I'm afraid I have nothing to offer except my apologies.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, several Construct Soldiers rush over with whistles in their mouths.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Zong-related dispute detected!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: "Are you trying to start another war, feeding people Zongs you know they won't like?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Humanity shall remain forever divided by the unbridgeable Zong Schism. It is up to us, the Zong Police, to maintain the fragile peace on Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: 'Take them away. It is because of these people that war never changes.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Please give me a chance!', 3: '95160'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Alright then... but choose wisely this time.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Right, Lee mentioned that he didn't like sweet things.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "So he probably finished all of Liv's desserts to make her happy.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Bianca! And Miss Ayla, too. What are you talking about?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Nothing except that exquisite new body of yours! I'd love to have you model for me sometime.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Um... if I can help.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'By the way, what do you know about the ruckus outside?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Truth be told, we were driven here by sheer irritation as well.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Though it is understandable. It is only fair to cajole and revel during a festival. To break them up would be somewhat obtuse on our part.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "No matter which side gets their way, it will all be a colorful addition to Babylonia's cultural and historical tapestry. It's fun to watch from a distance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'However, even neutral observers like us have to have standards when it comes to taste.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: '(Which Zong should I give Ayla?)'}
{2: 'White Lotus Bean Paste (Sweet Zong)', 3: '160', 4: 'Pork and Egg Yolk (Savory Zong)', 5: '163', 6: 'Ask Lucia for advice', 7: '166'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "White and flawless, like a work of art! And the sweetness and fragrance isn't overpowering at all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'The Commandant has good taste!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Well... objectively speaking, there's nothing wrong with the flavor...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'But it does feel a bit... boorish.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, several Construct Soldiers rush over with whistles in their mouths.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Zong-related dispute detected!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: "Are you trying to start another war, feeding people Zongs you know they won't like?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Humanity shall remain forever divided by the unbridgeable Zong Schism. It is up to us, the Zong Police, to maintain the fragile peace on Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: 'Take them away. It is because of these people that war never changes.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Please give me a chance!', 3: '865657'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Alright then... but choose wisely this time.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'In my mind, Miss Ayla probably prefers more aesthetically pleasing things.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: '(Which Zong should I give Bianca?)'}
{2: 'Red Date Paste (Sweet Zong)', 3: '172', 4: 'Fresh Ham (Savory Zong)', 5: '174', 6: 'Ask Lucia for advice', 7: '176'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'But it is still too sweet for my taste.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, several Construct Soldiers rush over with whistles in their mouths.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Zong-related dispute detected!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: "Are you trying to start another war, feeding people Zongs you know they won't like?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Humanity shall remain forever divided by the unbridgeable Zong Schism. It is up to us, the Zong Police, to maintain the fragile peace on Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: 'Take them away. It is because of these people that war never changes.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Please give me a chance!', 3: '858888'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Alright then... but choose wisely this time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "In my memories, meats were a valuable commodity, and salt was worth its weight in gold too... I've almost forgotten their taste on my tongue.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'It was delicious. Thank you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I remember Lee saying that his taste was not far off from Bianca's. Perhaps I could use her as a reference.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Both Miss Ayla and Bianca approve of Commandant's cooking. What a pleasant surprise.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Gray Raven Commandant! Grr~', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami... and Chrome?', 3: '187'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Lucia. Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Chrome, how come you're with Nanami?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "So you're Nanami? The strange Construct that Gray Raven talked about earlier?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Yeppers! Nanami usually goes by Nanami!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "So you two don't even know each other's names?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Would Lucia and Commandant like to join us?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Nanami, I understand... but Chrome too...?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Well, I could hardly refuse a lady in need of assistance... but I didn't think it would be to lobby for votes.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Alas, a gentleman honors his promises.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ooh~ are those Zongs you got there? Are they for us?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Which side are you on?', 3: '204'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That would be telling, and telling's no fun! Guess!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: '(Which Zong should I give Nanami?)'}
{2: 'Sesame and Roasted Nuts (Sweet Zong)', 3: '208', 4: 'Roast Pork (Savory Zong)', 5: '212', 6: 'Ask Lucia for advice', 7: '215'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Sweet... yummy!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But don't get cocky, Commandant. Of the four Sweet Sovereigns, Nanami is but the lowliest!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What is this Sweet Sovereign business now...', 3: '218'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Savory...euch!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Savory is ptooey... and Nanami hates ptooey!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, several Construct Soldiers rush over with whistles in their mouths.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Zong-related dispute detected!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: "Are you trying to start another war, feeding people Zongs you know they won't like?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Humanity shall remain forever divided by the unbridgeable Zong Schism. It is up to us, the Zong Police, to maintain the fragile peace on Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: 'Take them away. It is because of these people that war never changes.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Please give me a chance!', 3: '898988'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Alright then... but choose wisely this time.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Children usually gravitate towards sweets more... though Nanami hardly counts as one, it's a safe bet.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: '(Which Zong should I give Chrome?)'}
{2: 'Fruit and Honeyed Dates (Sweet Zong)', 3: '220', 4: 'Egg Yolk and Five Spice Pork (Savory Zong)', 5: '224', 6: 'Ask Lucia for advice', 7: '226'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Oh, my thanks, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'It is not... inedible, but common sense dictates that sweets have no place in a main course. The two should remain separate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Regrettably, I must draw the line at sweet rice...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, several Construct Soldiers rush over with whistles in their mouths.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Zong-related dispute detected!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: "Are you trying to start another war, feeding people Zongs you know they won't like?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Humanity shall remain forever divided by the unbridgeable Zong Schism. It is up to us, the Zong Police, to maintain the fragile peace on Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: 'Take them away. It is because of these people that war never changes.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Please give me a chance!', 3: '87846'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Alright then... but choose wisely this time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Oh, my thanks, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Ah, I prefer this over its sweeter counterpart.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "As I recall, Chrome once turned down one of Liv's dessert when I offered it to him. He probably doesn't have a sweet tooth.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But Nanami, on the other hand, has a huge sweet tooth. Strange, that he's hanging with her...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Chrome, you traitor! You have betrayed the Sweet League!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory40.jpg'}
{3: 'As you emerge onto the open area of the Babylonia plaza, you see two groups of people facing off against one another, brandishing banners and signs.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sweet Zong League Member', 3: 'Zongs that are sweet cannot be beat!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Savory Zong Party Member', 3: '"Savor" the better flavor!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong Police A', 3: 'Disperse! You are not authorized to gather here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Zong Police successfully disperse most of the rabble-rousers, until only the ringleaders of the opposing movements are left.'}
{2: 'Zong Police B', 3: 'Did you two have to start a riot...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "What was I supposed to do, stop the groundswell of support for savory Zongs? Why don't you ask that clueless ape over there?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I was elected as leader of this movement. I will not let them down!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Why won't you just concede that sweet Zongs should be the official Babylonian flavor?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: '*Beep—*ing *Beep—* YOU concede!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Kamui and Karen... so you two are the ringleaders?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "That's right. I represent the Sweet Zong League. Karen over there, she speaks for the pitiful Savory Zong Party... And please, call me Captain Kamui.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Tch... Lucia, Gray Raven Commandant... this doesn't concern you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Actually, Commandant wants to give you a few of these Zongs...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hmph, then give them already.', 4: '1'}
{3: '(Which Zong should I give Karenina?)'}
{2: 'Eight Treasures (Sweet Zong)', 3: '272', 4: 'Spicy Pork (Savory Zong)', 5: '277'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "You're kidding me... only kids eat sticky sweet stuff like this. Ugh, I can feel my stomach turning just looking at it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "*Beep—*, fine! You're so annoying. I warn you, if this isn't to my taste, I'll yeet the whole thing to outer space.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'No problem.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I mean... it's alright... kinda sweet...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Didn't think you'd like it", 3: '632563'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "What's that s'posed to mean? You saying I don't have a sweet personality to match?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What is this stuff... why is it hot?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'So weird... how dare you give me such a weird combination of flavors! Such a... weirdly... enticing...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'And yet you ate it all', 3: '282'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Shut up, you!', 4: '1'}
{3: '(Which Zong should I give Kamui?)'}
{2: 'Crystal Lotus Seed (Sweet Zong)', 3: '287', 4: 'Abalone Seafood (Savory Zong)', 5: '295'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Such sweetness in a delectable little package. Convenient!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I could eat these all day.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You have to unwrap the leaves...', 3: '293'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Ahahaha, is that so? (nibble) I was just about to say that the leaves are a bit on the tough side! (nibble)', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: '"Savory is heresy", that\'s what they say...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Truth be told, savory isn't all bad... hmm, pretty tasty, to be honest!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You have to unwrap the leaves...', 3: '301'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Ahahaha, is that so? (nibble) I was just about to say that the leaves are a bit on the tough side! (nibble)', 4: '1'}
{3: '(Which Zong should I give Kamui?)'}
{2: 'Crystal Lotus Seed (Sweet Zong)', 3: '306', 4: 'Abalone Seafood (Savory Zong)', 5: '314'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Such sweetness in a delectable little package. Convenient!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I could eat these all day.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You have to unwrap the leaves...', 3: '312'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Ahahaha, is that so? (nibble) I was just about to say that the leaves are a bit on the tough side! (nibble)', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: '"Savory is heresy", that\'s what they say...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Truth be told, savory isn't all bad... hmm, pretty tasty, to be honest!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You have to unwrap the leaves...', 3: '320'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Ahahaha, is that so? (nibble) I was just about to say that the leaves are a bit on the tough side! (nibble)', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'At least all the Zongs are gone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant? What's wrong?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Didn't think I'd be this tired", 3: '327', 4: 'Since when did gifting get so hard...', 5: '327'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Don't worry. Come tomorrow, they'll be back to normal... mostly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Still, it's a shame that Commandant's Zongs couldn't bring everyone together for the festival...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Was I that transparent...', 3: '330'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I usually have a feel for what you're thinking.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Festivals are rare occasions. It would be nice to have all of Babylonia together to celebrate.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "So? The Gray Raven Commandant knows his way around a Zong, doesn't he?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hmph... it's so-so. It's better than you, Kamui, gorging yourself on savory Zongs.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Yep! Those savory Zongs were halfway decent... And that's Captain Kamui to you.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ahh! Even Captain Kamui has gone rogue!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Savory Zongs ain't half bad!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's it! Nanami wants to try the other flavors too!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Nobody was keeping you in the first place...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Captain! You're here too?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'No, I distinctly recall you crowning yourself Captain, Captain Kamui.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Ahh... I was just horsing around, Captain.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'It would seem that this "war" of ours shall end unresolved.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "That's alright. War, in all its forms, is never a good thing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Festivals like these, it's better to have everyone together.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Though we seem to be short on Zongs', 3: '3601'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I actually brought a lot of sweet treats too, Commandant. If you don't mind... we can all share.", 4: '1'}
{2: "What's the matter, Lucia?", 3: '365', 4: 'Babylonia to Lucia...?', 5: '365'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's great when everyone comes together, Commandant. I wish we can spend every year, every month, and every holiday just like this.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's good, on a day like this, to have everyone together.", 4: '1'}
